reviewText: My kids like it a lot. Good videos. www.amazingfacts.org
The kids argued and had attitudes in these videos. Some children might learn some good lessons from the stories they tell.

I have 3 little boys from 19 months to 5 years to 7 years.  They LOVE to watch these dvd's!!  My husband and I actually really enjoyed watching them as well.  Super fast shipping.  We will certainly be ordering more for stocking stuffers and all kinds of gifts.  Thank you very much!!
Just what I was looking for.  Very entertaining for my 7 year old son and incorporates biblical truths.  Great video!

I was pleasantly surprised at how much my family enjoyed this video.  It is a little older, so you have to see hairstyles that are way outdated, but in no way does this detract from how entertaining it is.  And, the best part is that it is educational and presents a Biblical worldview.
